data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The results of our analysis appear to be in line with our hypothesis. If ____ is ____ correlated ____ lower ____ of ____, ____ we ____ a ____ relationship ____ distribution ____ future ____. If, however, future research reveals hidden forces that we have not observed in this study, then we may have to revise our tentative conclusion.
data.partBlankContent: The results of our analysis appear to be in line with our hypothesis. If pov____ is tr___ correlated wi__ lower ra___ of educ_____, th__ we s__ a trans______ relationship inc___ distribution a__ future voca____. If, however, future research reveals hidden forces that we have not observed in this study, then we may have to revise our tentative conclusion.
data.answer: 我们的分析结果似乎与我们的假设相符。如果贫困真的与较低的受教育率相关，那么我们就会看到收入分配与未来职业之间的关系是透明的。然而，如果未来的研究揭示了我们在这项研究中没有观察到的隐藏力量，那么我们可能不得不修改我们的初步结论。
